DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study carry pilot project compare effectiveness two therapeutic approach temporomandibular disorder ( TMDs ) adolescent . Eight female individual diagnose base Research Diagnosis Criteria TMDs ( RDC/TMD-axis 1 ) randomly divide two group : 1 ) Massage therapy muscle stretch ( n=4 ) ; 2 ) transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) ( n=4 ) . Regardless treatment , ten session hold patient two measurement ( baseline 10th session ) perform assessment symptom evolution use visual analog scale ( VAS ) , maximum opening mouth ( MOM ) pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) . Statistical analysis wiil carefully select .
DOC.criteria: Pain orofacial area least 3 month Diagnosed group 1 RDC/TMD ( myofascial pain without mouth open limit ) Drug use treatment pain Functional limitation would harm diagnosis
